body_content.explanation: Purificatory practices remove bad thoughts and feelings from someone so they become pure (= morally good):
examples: After participating in the purificatory ceremony, the novices enter a two-year period of seclusion.
He went through many purificatory practices and eventually reached a state of spiritual enlightenment.

body_content.explanation: having the effect of cleaning something or someone:
examples: The treatment cleanses the metabolism through purificatory therapies and rejuvenates the whole body.
The fire has had a purificatory effect on the land.
